RelatedSentence: Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd ( BPCL ) has signed a deal with ADNOC , national oil company of the United Arab Emirates , to import 60,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) oil in 2014-15 .
Bharat Petroleum Corporation Ltd ( BPCL ) has signed a deal with ADNOC , national oil company of the United Arab Emirates , to import 60,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) oil in 2014-15 .

A0: BPCL , along with its subsidiary Bharat Oman Refineries Ltd -LRB- BORL -RRB-
RelatedSentence: Also BPCL , along with its subsidiary Bharat Oman Refineries Ltd ( BORL ) , has also signed a deal with Kuwati Petroleum Company to buy 84,000 bpd oil in the fiscal year to March 31 , 2015 .
